    Planting diversity of Tiny Forests

    Planting_diversity_of_Tiny_Forests.Rmd
    library(needs)
needs(tinyforestR, sf, tidyverse, vegan)

    Read in TF data 

    
data("tf_data")
    
tf_data |>
  count(year = year(plant_date)) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_col(aes(year, n)) +
  geom_label(aes(year, n, label = n)) +
  labs(title = "TFs planted per year") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title.position = "plot")

    Tree diversity 

    needs(patchwork)

## annual planting

tf_trees <- tf_data |>
  mutate(trees_1 = str_split(trees, "\\|")) |>
  select(-trees) |>
  unnest("trees_1") |>
  mutate(trees_1 = str_remove(trees_1, "\nExport Tags"))

tf_trees |>
  group_by(tf_id) |>
  summarise(n = n()) |>
  ggplot(aes(n)) +
  geom_density(fill = "darkgreen") +
  labs(title = "Distribution of tree species", 
       x = "Number of tree species per TF") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title.position = "plot")
